item.title: Prime Card – An On-Demand Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Prime Card – An On-Demand Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Prime Card

Prime Card is an on-demand mobile application used for hotels near your location or at your current location. Makes your hotel more apparent to your customer and by offering rewards to hold your customer for a long time.

About Prime Card Application

Prime Card is an on-demand Mobile Application that is mainly developed for hotels to make them visible for the customers by allowing the user to find the hotels near them with the location. With this application, you can make your hotel more apparent to your customer.

Prime Card has a unique feature on login. It provides biometric authentication with fingerprint and face id unlock. Along with biometric authentication, this application allows you to refer a friend, offer a gift card, and show the hotels in both map view and list view.

Prime Card - Features

Biometric Authentication

After the sign-in users can log in with the user id and password or they can use biometric authentication. The biometric authentication used in this application is fingerprint and face id. This increases the security of the Prime Card application. It gives a new user experience to the users.  You can also log in as a guest.

Hotel Search

You can search the hotel according to your current location and you can search by nearby location. You can view the hotels in two ways either by map view or by list view. Registering your hotel in this application makes your business more visible to the customers.

Refer A Friend

Users can refer a friend to this application and both of them can get rewards. This feature gives a major advantage by attracting customers. You can refer a friend with a simple procedure by proving their name, mail id, number.

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need Prime Card Application

Easy way to find a hotel near you.

Makes your hotel more apparent to your customer.

Rewards to hold your customer for a long time.

Advanced Biometric authentication.

Lets the customer know about the travel offers you provide.

Map view to know your location accurately.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

The post Prime Card – An On-Demand Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Carwash – Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Carwash – Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Carwash

Provide easy access to your customers with nearby branches of your service. We provide a solution by deploying a mobile application to increase your customer engagement and make your business more visible to customers.

About Carwash Application

Car Wash is a mobile application used for your business to provide better customer engagement and easy access to reach the nearby location.  This application makes your business more apparent to the customers. 

This application is deployed for car washing services. This allows your location to the customers in search of car wash service. The advanced feature makes it easy to use. This includes the search of service centers in a nearby location, online payment, subscription management, and vehicle detail.

Carwash - Features

List Of Service Center

A list of car services at your location will be shown. The list helps your business more visible to the customers. The car service centers at a particular location will be listed through registration. This will provide easy access to your customers to reach your branch near them.

Payment

The payment has both online and offline methods. This makes the customer more comfortable and convenient. It’s easy to set up an online payment option, and you may start selling within minutes of doing so. Customers today tend to trust retailers who accept online payments more than those who don’t.

Subscription

Subscriptions plans are for 1 year with a code generator. This subscription plan helps you to hold your customer for a long time. You can able build a good bond with the customers.

Location

You’ll be visible to more customers near your location. It gives better and easy access to your customers. It’ll be more convenient for the customer to access the nearby center for their services.

Profile and Vehicle Details

The profile details include the name, mobile number, and password for the login. The vehicle details include the number of the car you can add the details to it. With this, you can change your details.

Review

After the service, the customer can review their service. This helps the other customer to know about your services. This increases the trust of the customers and notices your work.

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need CarwashApplication

More apparent to customers.

Easy online payments method.

Easy subscription maintenance.

Better customer engagement.

Maintain vehicle details.

Better and easy access to your customers with your nearby branches.

Holds the customer for a long time.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

item.title: BeautyConnect – Native Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post BeautyConnect – Native Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
BeautyConnect - Native Application

BeautyConnect is an easy-to-use native mobile application with extensive features for everyone. Using BeautyConnect, you’ll be able to access beauty parlors and other beauty care services from the comfort of your home. Get groomed with BeautyConnect mobile application.

About BeautyConnect Application

BeautyConnect is a native mobile application that allows customers to book their preferred parlors and beauty centers for treatments, as well as access and buy personalized goods online. Now, booking a local beauty parlor is as simple as a click away.

With BeautyConnect allows users to book their appointment in their preferred parlor. In addition to booking appointments, you may also pick the service you want and purchase their goods using both offline and online payment options.

Book Your Appointment

Users may easily search for, discover, and book their favorite parlors and other services. This allows the user to book their appointments by seeing the availability of the parlor timing. Booking can be done simply by searching your location Pincode and choosing your gender.

Parlor Services

After selecting the timing of the preferred parlor you’ll be choosing the services you want. The services include hair, skin, nail, treatment. The gives you a personalized experience and saves your time. 

Parlor Lists

The parlor details help you to know about the parlor. This detail includes the parlor’s name, office types like a head office or branch, address, and contact detail. This also includes the service and session details. This gives assurance to the customers.

Payment

The payment option includes both online and offline payment. The offline feature such as cash on delivery and online payment include the UPI payments. By providing the contact info your payment will be completed. Easy checkout process. BeautyConnect makes the payment in a secured way.

Offer Details

This feature shows the offer you provide to your customer with a notification. This can attract the customer and hold your customer for a long time. This helps you to increase your customer engagement.

Technology We Used

Native Application

  • Java
  • XML

Why Need BeautyConnect Application

Easy accessible.

Get more visible to customers nearby your parlor.

Save time by booking online.

Connect with customers 24/7.

Offer & notification to hold your customers.

Book according to your availability.

User friendly.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead

item.title: Restaurant POS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Restaurant POS appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Restaurant POS

Managing the restaurant or the cafeteria is almost tiring thus we introduce  Restaurant POS which helps you to make the management easier and add profit to your business.

About Restaurant POS Application

Restaurant POS is a web application that is a complete point of sale software to manage your daily restaurant operations. It is designed to serve and assist the Food and Beverage (F&B) industry, restaurant management expedites every operation of the restaurant.

In this application, you can manage your restaurant’s easy billing, order management, dining management, managing the stock, and an eCommerce site. The main advantage of this application is it is bidirectional.

Food Order

Taking order manually takes your time and chances of making mistake is huge. But when the order is placed through an eCommerce application, saves your time. Order is directly sent to the kitchen server once it was taken. The order will be sent along with the table number. 

Mobile Application

Restaurant POS eCommerce application is available for android. In this application after login, you will see the home page consists of a number of floors with an available table so it’ll be easy to know your availability. The orders will be taken through this application. 

Mini Screen

The mini screen is the duplicate screen of the admin screen that displays only the placed orders. The duplicate screen can be placed in the kitchen so that the chef can view the placed order.

Bidirectional

The key advantage of this application is that it is bidirectional. When you update the F&B product on the POS screen it’ll directly be updated to the eCommerce site. It saves your time and work.

QR Scan

The customers can scan the QR code from the restaurant so that they can place the order along with the table number by themselves. Once the QR code is scanned you’ll be directed to the Food and beverages listed in categories and place the order in no time.

Payment

The payment can be done both online and in cash. The online payment is done by HitPay. Your payment will be done in a quick and secure way. 

Technology We Used

Web Application

  • AngularJS
  • ReactJS
  • VueJS
  • CodeIgniter

Mobile Application

  • Ionic

Payment Method

  • HitPay

Why Need Restaurant POS Application

Multiple Device Synchronization

Multiple Order Type Selection Modes And Screens.

Easy Item Modifications And Updates.

Quick Order Lookup.

Comfortable Payment Screen.

Table Order Taking.

Reduce Waiting Time.

Error Control

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead

item.title: Madurai Children Hospital
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Madurai Children Hospital appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Madurai Children Hospital

Manage the children’s vaccination online and make an appointment online. We make this possible by deploying a Web application.

About Madurai Children Hospital Application

This application specifically is used in hospitals to maintain the patient’s vaccination records, which is fairly significant. This application includes the SMS report, particularly the Weekly report, Patient’s details, and QR scanner for Online appointments.

Madurai children’s Hospital application is deployed for both web application and website. The web application maintains the patient’s details and their reports. Whereas websites used to get online appointments.

Patient’s Details

The patient’s details include the Name of the patient, Date of birth, mobile number, and their parent’s details. These will be used for patient registration. The appointments are made along with these details. This detail helps the hospital to maintain the patient’s record.

The patient’s vaccination list will be shown along with the due date to get the vaccination and the date of vaccination given to the patient. This helps maintain the vaccination record and to avoid confusion.

SMS Trigger

The SMS trigger is to remind the patient about their vaccination. The SMS trigger will be recorded in the SMS log. The SMS log includes the number of the patient, contact number, and the date of the SMS sent.  

The SMS trigger helps your patient to get vaccination on time. With this feature, you’ll not miss the vaccination. This helps to maintain the patient’s to get vaccination regularly.

Weekly Report

The Weekly report can be viewed from date to date. This helps you to maintain the patient’s report for a week. The weekly report enhances your performance to maintain the patient’s record in an easy way. The weekly record can be viewed at any time. You can get the patient’s record in no time.

Website

Appointments can be made online through the website. Online appointments can be done easily just by scanning the QR code. This makes it easy for the patients to make appointments. Through the website, you’ll be apparent to the people so they can approach the hospital. This makes an assurance to the people.

Technology We Used

Core PHP

WordPress

Bootstrap

Javascript

jQuery

Why Need Madurai Children Hospital Application

Easy Maintenance On The Patient’s Vaccination Record.

Easy Online Appointment.

Vaccination Remainder.

Avoid Confusion Where The Patient Is Vaccinated Or Not.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead

item.title: Uniqpos
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Uniqpos appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Uniq POS

Managing the entire store must be difficult that’s why we design Uniq POS. Easily maintain your business with this application.

About Uniq POS

Uniq POS is a web application that makes doing business simple for you. We offer easy-to-use sales functions, allowing you to quickly and log the sales process and when the internet goes offline, Uniq POS will continue to sell instantly when you return online.

This application is deployed for Web Application. With this application, you’ll able to view your product, orders. This application can be used by multiple domains with the control of Super Admin. Uniq POS can be integrated with marketplaces.The efficient features of Uniq POS make it more scalable.

Multi-Domain

Uniq POS application can be used by multiple domains under the control of Super Admin. This feature helps to maintain the numerous subunit you have for your business. The Admin POS and eCommerce have separate multi-domains.

eCommerce

Along with the POS application, you get eCommerce for your business. This eCommerce feature allows you to lookup up your stocks and syncs the product.The eCommerce can be Integrated/Configurated with Lazada, Shopee.

Bidirectional Sync

The update of the product, orders, and category will be automatically synced with the marketplace (Lazada, Shopee) through eCommerce and vice versa. You need to update the items in anyone either eCommerce or marketplace

Offline POS

Your work will not be paused when you are offline. This is the main advantage of using Uniq POS. This application will work as an offline POS.

Package Upgrade & Downgrade

At the yearly renewal, you can increase or decrease the POS system according to your business need. User and POS terminal packages can be upgraded and downgraded.

Payment

At the yearly renewal, you can increase or decrease the POS system according to your business need. User and POS terminal packages can be upgraded and downgraded.

Technology We Used

Laravel

Javascript

jQuery

Node js

Bootstrap

shell script

Integrate with your favorite Payment Method

PayPal

Ipay88

Razorpay

Why Need Uniq POS?

Quick keys and/or product lookup

Multiple payment methods.

Easy maintenance

Able to work offline

Boost up the business through Integration

We are always ahead
